ground_truth.thought: 提交贷款申请并获取审批结果
ground_truth.name: LoanApplication.submit_application

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PetLoan.get_interest_rate', 'description': 'Get the current interest rate for a specific type of pet supplies loan.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'product_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of pet supplies loan'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'interest_rate', 'description': 'the current interest rate for the specified loan type'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想申请一笔宠物用品贷款，首先，我需要了解当前的宠物用品贷款利率。然后，我需要查询我的信用评分，以确定我是否有资格申请贷款。接着，我需要计算我每月可以负担的还款金额。最后，我需要提交贷款申请并获取审批结果。当前这一步的目标是什么?
了解当前的宠物用品贷款利率
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PetLoan.get_interest_rate
当前工具的参数'product_type'的值是什么?
pet_supplies
{'interest_rate': '5.25%'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'interest_rate': '5.25%'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
查询我的信用评分
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
CreditScore.get_score
当前工具的参数'user_id'的值是什么?
user_12345
{'credit_score': 720}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'credit_score': 720}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
计算我每月可以负担的还款金额
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
LoanCalculator.calculate_monthly_payment
当前工具的参数'loan_amount'和'interest_rate'的值是什么?
loan_amount: 1000, interest_rate: 5.25%
{'monthly_payment': 50.00}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'monthly_payment': 50.00}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 提交贷款申请并获取审批结果
